Name: パズルハムスター ～地球冒険記～
About the game: match3 puzzle action game！ Press the block. Climb the block. Erase the block. Let's aim for the goal! Simple puzzle game！ ■rule Flag is the goal. Match 3 or more of the same colored blocks. The block cannot be pulled. Only one can be pressed. Can climb one step. There are 50 stages in the game.
